identity.headline: Full-stack software engineer crafting reliable, production-ready systems with modern web technologies

projects.title: SwiftSend
projects.subtitle: My Consulting Company
projects.description: Consulting engagement to refine courier assignment flows, add tracking views, and stabilize order processing for a delivery services startup.
projects.outcome: Improved dispatch reliability and clarified real-time status visibility for operations teams.

projects.title: ShopRavi’s Wholesale & Retail
projects.subtitle: Ravi’s Import Warehouse
projects.description: Wholesale catalog and ordering interface featuring inventory search, pricing updates, and basic analytics for Ravi’s Import Warehouse.
projects.outcome: Reduced manual data entry and delivered stable storefront tooling for a wholesale business.

experience.summary: Building and maintaining production web applications supporting pricing updates, catalog management, and internal order workflows for a wholesale client.
Led floor operations, coordinated scheduling, and ensured consistent customer experience during high-traffic periods.
Delivered English and Spanish customer support in a regulated environment, resolving complex account issues and documenting outcomes accurately.

growth.summary: Deepening full-stack fundamentals, polishing portfolio projects, and applying to software engineering roles focused on reliable client delivery.
Building larger systems with stronger backend depth, performance tuning, and better observability for automation flows.
Growing into ownership of scalable architectures, leading reliability efforts, and mentoring through delivery.

contact.headline: Let's Connect
contact.pitch: Open to full-time software engineering roles focused on reliable delivery and systems thinking. Ready to contribute to teams that value clarity and ownership.
